name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-details-tab-nodejs
title: Meetings Details Tab
shortDescription: This sample app demonstrates how to implement a Details Tab in Microsoft Teams meetings, allowing users to create polls and gather participant feedback through interactive chats.
longDescription: This sample application showcases the implementation of a Details Tab within Microsoft Teams meetings, enabling users to create and post polls for participant feedback. Participants can submit their responses via adaptive cards, and results are accessible both in the meeting chat and on the Details Tab, enhancing engagement and interactivity.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing meetings details tab

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
